en.title: FusionExcel Donates 50,000,000 VND to Thien Nhan Charity Foundation, Vietnam!
en.content: FE is proud to donate 50,000,000 VND to the Thien Nhan Charity Foundation Vietnam at FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at Ho Chi Minh City on 30th May 2009. FE's Founder CEO presented the Mock Cheque to the Representative of the Foundation. FE also donated 12 sets of Quantum Pendants to the Foundation to kick start their social entrepreneurism drive. The Chairman of the Foundation, former Deputy Mayor of Ho Chi Minh City, Madam Le Thi Van accepted the Quantum Pendants on behalf of the Foundation.

meta.description: FusionExcel donates 50,000,000 VND to Thien Nhan Charity Foundation at Ho Chi Minh City on 30th May 2009.
